project.contribution: UI Developer | Theme Designer | Template Developer | Common UI Error Debugger
project.detail:
A reliable, transparent, and cost-effective method of managing electricity distribution.
                                          Distribution sector is the cash register for the entire electricity business value chain. It is where the revenue is created, and it flows upstream to the transmission and generation companies. But unfortunately, distribution companies are the weakest link in this value chain.
project.Learning: Teamwork, Debugging, Work Performance, Task Management
steps: Designed a modern UI for the admin panel.
Implemented template repository for other backend developers.
Explored multiple libraries for UI enhancements.
Resolved common UI errors and provided training.
